Author: thebaroquebitch
Text: I gained weight on abilify so I went off it but I wish I never did bc it worked so well otherwise!

Author: Illogicalbiologist
Text: I took it a few years ago and I did notice a lot of water bloating. It was never truly weight, and after a few months it did settle and I went back to how I was before. Maybe it’s just the adjustment period? It’s probably just initial bloating!
